name: Panacea (Summer Frost Studios)
description:
Please note: This game is still currently in active development, and as such is subject to bugs and frequent changes. Be sure to check back regularly for further updates.

In Panacea you take on the role of an expert combat medic. A patient has fallen gravely ill and the only way to save them is to be shrunken down to microscopic size and fight the infection head on. With support from the enigmatic Dr Carson and the wonders of science, your mission is to conquer the body from what ails it.

Will you be the ultimate Panacea?
